Comment: They're also pushing for the release (or at least trial) of everyone who's been sent to CECOT from the US - the point of this case isn't that Abrego Garcia is so sympathetic that he deserves a special exception, but that *everyone* deserves due process and *every* court order not to deport should be honored.

Comment: >Four Democratic lawmakers visited El Salvador to demand the release of a man wrongly deported, highlighting concerns about due process.  Really, this is just... unbelievable. It makes me so angry! How can we even tolerate this kind of thing happening? The fact that they're clinging to this flimsy claim, a federal judge *already* dismissed the Trump administration's accusations about him being linked to MS-13. Like, it's not even close to being a legitimate argument anymore. They just want to deflect blame, and it's honestly disgusting. People deserve better, and this whole situation is a real stain on our country, and something has to change, quickly.
